title: Table Storage Size
text: When multiple tables are joined together, the same amount of storage is required.

title: Use of Central Repository
text: A central repository does not need to be made because all of the relevant data is already included in the tables. A central repository doesn't necessarily mean all the tables are joined, just that all the tables are available in a central location.

title: Complexity of Tables
text: Joining tables together does not necessarily decrease the amount of tables in the database as each individual table could still contain important information not reflected in the joined table.
